title: Can I take the ANTHE in class 11 if I am already an Aakashian? If yes, then would I get a refund which I paid until now if I got a 100% scholarship? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes, you can give ANTHE while being an Aakashian. The fees which you have already paid will not be refunded, but the fees of the remaining quarters will not be charged. You can avail the scholarship by changing your course type. This will not effect your studies. You've to exit the previous course and register for the new course in which you'll get scholarship offers. (There may be some other information on the website, but this is what actually happend with me when a got a 100% scholarship)
